author: On February
title: Daria Gavrilova s awesome reaction to Roger Federer Australian Open victory - Yahoo7
text:
Daria Gavrilova s awesome reaction to Roger Federer Australian Open victory - Yahoo7 Video has emerged of Daria Gavrilova's hilarious reaction to Roger Federer's incredible Australian Open victory. Close Dasha's awesome reaction to Federer victory UP NEXT VIDEO Dasha's awesome reaction to Federer victory. Source: Twitter/Daria Gavriova Dasha's awesome reaction to Federer victory 
The Aussie fan favourite was watching Sunday night's final between Federer and Rafael Nadal at Melbourne Park alongside fellow players Kristina Mladenovic and Belinda Bencic, as well as a host of others. 
Sitting on the floor in front of the TV like an adoring fan, the video above shows Dasha's awesome reaction to the final point of the thrilling five-set match. Mladenovic, Bencic and Gavrilova watch on. Image: Twitter 
The 22-year-old throws her hands to her head in despair as Federer's championship-winning shot gets sent to hawk-eye by Nadal. 
She then erupts with joy when she sees the winner is good and Federer is victorious. Dasha is delighted, but are these people Nadal fans? Image: Twitter 
Dasha is clearly a massive Federer fan, taking to Twitter after the epic match: â€” Daria Gavrilova (@Daria_gav) January 29, 2017 I still love Rafa tho!! â€” Daria Gavrilova (@Daria_gav) January 29, 2017 
She also describes this photo with Federer as 'by far my favourite'. Last photo on my phone from 2016 is by far my favourite photo ðŸ˜‚ #Feds pic.twitter.com/suJGc8mRi1 â€” Daria Gavrilova (@Daria_gav) December 31, 2016 
Meanwhile, Gavrilova has been sent packing from the St Pertersburg Trophy tournament in straight sets by Russian third seed Svetlana Kuznetsova. 
Kuznetsova defeated the Australian 6-1 6-3 to extend her unbeaten record against Gavrilova to four straight matches and move into the quarter-finals. Close Federer beats Nadal to claim his 18th Grand Slam title UP NEXT
